{"id":1016223646,"question_id":2720,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"10 months, 1 week","timestamp":1691552647,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1016223646/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimize the Maximum Difference of Pairs","memory":"59.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minimizeMax(int[] nums, int p) {\n        // 1 1 2 3 7 10 => max ([1,1], [2,3])  // [1 10], [3 10], [2 10]\n        \n        Arrays.sort(nums);\n        int len = nums.length;\n        \n        int st =0, ed=nums[len-1]-nums[0];\n        while(st<ed){\n            int k = 0;\n            int mid = st + (ed-st)/2;\n            \n            for(int i=1; i<len && k<p; i++){\n                if(nums[i]-nums[i-1]<=mid){\n                    k++;\n                    i++;\n                }\n            }\n            \n            if(k>=p)\n                ed=mid;\n            else{\n                st = mid+1;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return st;\n        \n        \n    }\n}\n\n// 1 2 2 4","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimize-the-maximum-difference-of-pairs","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
